backend/main.mo: Defines core ERP data types including products, orders, inventory, invoices, notifications, and multiple status enums, incorporating storage and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping optimization features to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides human‑written summaries for numerous frontend files describing their behavior, features, and performance optimizations.
frontend/index.css: Sets global Tailwind CSS variables and themes for light and dark modes, configuring color tokens and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main module script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component handling authentication, bootstrap loading, conditional routing, and lazy-loaded views with polling control.
UI for users awaiting admin approval, showing profile details, enabling approval requests, and allowing logout.
frontend/src/components/AuthenticatedApp: Layout shell with sidebar, header, theme toggle, loading state, and footer placeholders for authenticated pages.
frontend/src/components/BarcodeGenerator: Generates Code128 and QR barcodes for a product using dynamic libraries, with validation, error handling, and download options.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright text and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with menu button, branding, theme toggle, and user dropdown including logout and profile details.
frontend/src/components/InvoiceGenerator: Generates invoice images and PDFs by drawing formatted invoice content onto a canvas, including logo, metadata, customer info, and line items.
frontend/src/components/LoadingWorkspace: Full‑screen animated loading screen for workspace initialization.
frontend/src/components/modules/Analytic: Displays business analytics using charts, revenue stats, and order data filtered by user role.
frontend/src/components/modules/BarcodeM: Provides barcode scanning for inventory stock updates with role checks and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/modules/Customer: Manages customer creation, search, listing, and admin‑only deletion.
frontend/src/components/modules/Dashboar: Shows dashboard metrics, recent activity, charts, and alerts based on orders, products, notifications, and invoices.
frontend/src/components/modules/Inventor: Manages product inventory with listing, search, editing, barcode generation, and QR scanning. Handles product creation, updates, and low‑stock identification.
Generates barcode canvases and PDF reports for all products using JsBarcode and jsPDF. Validates product data and handles asynchronous library loading.
frontend/src/components/modules/InvoiceH: Displays searchable, filterable invoice history with status badges and invoice preview. Loads related customer and product data for contextual display.
frontend/src/components/modules/InvoiceM: Creates invoices by adding items, calculating totals, and adjusting stock levels. Supports invoice preview and integration with customer and product lists.
frontend/src/components/modules/Notifica: Lists notifications with relative timestamps, marking-as-read, and refresh actions. Sorts notifications by time and displays unread counts.
frontend/src/components/modules/OrdersMo: Displays and filters orders, allows order creation with stock checks, and supports admin-only deletion.
frontend/src/components/modules/ProfitLo: Generates profit/loss reports by date range, displays charts, and supports PDF/Excel export with role-based access.
frontend/src/components/modules/ReportsM: Shows sales, inventory, and data-entry reports with alerts and exports, restricted to admin/accountant roles.
frontend/src/components/modules/Secondar: Manages a list of secondary admin emails with add/remove actions and validation.
frontend/src/components/modules/UserMana: Provides admin-only user approval and role assignment with access restrictions and table display.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Form for creating a user profile with fields for name, email, department, and role, submitting via a saveProfile hook.
frontend/src/components/Sidebar.tsx: Renders a role‑based sidebar with module navigation and mobile support.
frontend/src/context/PollingContext.tsx: Context managing dashboard polling based on tab visibility and active module state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance based on the user's Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and handling login/logout through AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data, including bootstrap state, user profiles, and other app resources with polling and caching.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS theme variables, animations, and UI styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard container that loads user profile, admin status, and lazily rendered feature modules with polling integration.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen that triggers Internet Identity authentication and displays loading states.
frontend/src/utils/invoiceDocument.ts: Utility functions and constants for formatting invoice documents, including layout, currency, dates, and line-item calculations.
frontend/src/utils/stockErrors.ts: Parses various error shapes to detect insufficient-stock cases and returns a boolean flag with a user-friendly message.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and manage hash-based routing values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, and containers with plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature lists, new feature requests, and current project configuration for performance-focused improvements.
